goblin01.name: Goblin
goblin01.description: A mischievous green creature with a sharp grin.
goblin01.intro: The goblin snarls and prepares to strike!

zombie01.name: Zombie
zombie01.description: A shambling undead with vacant eyes.
zombie01.intro: The zombie groans and lurches forward!

B.name: Bandit
B.description: A scruffy thief eyeing your belongings.
B.intro: The bandit lunges for your coin purse!

goblin_scout.name: Goblin Scout
goblin_scout.description: A keen-eyed goblin keeping watch over the hills.
goblin_scout.intro: The scout spots you and blows a horn!

goblin_archer.name: Goblin Archer
goblin_archer.description: This goblin prefers attacking from a distance.
goblin_archer.intro: A goblin archer nocks an arrow your way!

rotting_warrior.name: Rotting Warrior
rotting_warrior.description: A decayed soldier still clinging to its rusted blade.
rotting_warrior.intro: The rotting warrior staggers forward with a groan!

scout_commander.name: Scout Commander
scout_commander.description: Leader of the goblin scouting parties, armored and alert.
scout_commander.intro: The scout commander barks orders and charges!
scout_commander.onDefeatMessage: The commander falls. A silence settles over the hills.

wandering_shade.name: Wandering Shade
wandering_shade.description: A spectral remnant drifting between realms.
wandering_shade.intro: A chill fills the air as a shadowy figure emerges!

stone_beetle.name: Stone Beetle
stone_beetle.description: A heavy-shelled insect that rumbles with each step.
stone_beetle.intro: Stones crack as a massive beetle scuttles toward you!

phantom_mage.name: Phantom Mage
phantom_mage.description: A ghostly spellcaster muttering forgotten words.
phantom_mage.intro: The air grows cold as a phantom mage materializes!

shadow_lurker.name: Shadow Lurker
shadow_lurker.description: A creature that thrives in darkness and strikes unseen.
shadow_lurker.intro: A Shadow Lurker melts out of the gloom!

flame_hound.name: Flame Hound
flame_hound.description: A fiery beast wreathed in scorching flames.
flame_hound.intro: A Flame Hound leaps toward you with blazing jaws!
